column5: Due to market conditions I have decided to close the shop Aug.31st..Thanks to all the board members that have supported me with their business.All stock must go so there are some great deals to be had.
Sorry to hear about this!! It sucks to see the little guy close because of the big boys crowding you out. Good luck in your next endeavour!!!!!
Sorry to hear, I will have to make it up before you close.
Sorry to hear Dave.  I really liked your store and you know your stuff.  Good luck for the future sir!
So sorry to here this Dave I really enjoyed going to your store.  vance
Yeah, sorry to hear you've had to make what must've been a tough decision.  Where is the store located for people who may not know?
Well that sucks Dave.  I hope to get out there before the end of the month. for those that asked. 1561 KING ST. UNIT #8 COURTICE, ON. L1E 2G5 905-576-8600
sorry to hear that Dave, good luck in the future

Thanks guys!! I will missing running the shop, loved doing it and really feel bad as I had many very loyal customers and I feel like I have let them down in a sense.I will miss the visits and the chat.
